*Long-term context that spans weeks. Read at session start; update at session end.*

**Last updated:** 2026-01-25

---

## Current Focus

**2026 Theme:** *"The year I become visible outside Lockton."*

**Active Goals:**
- **G1: External Visibility** ‚Äî 1 speaking gig + 2 articles published
- **G2: Innovation Leadership** ‚Äî Thesis defined + 2 pilots with measurable impact
- **G3: Role Transition** ‚Äî Smooth handoff to West CIO by Q2
- **G4: Global EA Practice** ‚Äî Year 1 pitch approved + budget secured

**This Week's #1:** Seattle trip ‚Äî pitch Innovation Sprint to Byron informally

---

## Key Relationships & Context

### Byron Clymer (Boss, Global CIO)
- Pushed Innovation Sprint deadline to 2/7 ‚Äî breathing room
- Seattle next week ‚Äî opportunity for informal pitch over drinks
- Expects: Survey synthesis deck + Innovation Sprint plan
- Style: Wants clear business outcomes, not just tech demos

### Innovation Sprint Committee
- **Jennifer Bryant** ‚Äî excited to help, 3-person committee
- **Shanna Sommers** ‚Äî development focus: more business engagement
- **You** ‚Äî thesis owner, architecture lead

### Perficient & Forrester (EA Assessment)
- Perficient: Waiting on proposal (due 1/30)
- Forrester: Waiting on Jonathan Jenkins email
- Need a 3rd option: CapG? Slalom?

---

## Active Projects

| Project | Status | Next Action |
|---------|--------|-------------|
| [[Innovation Thesis]] | v0.1 complete | Review with advisors (March) |
| [[0_Innovation_Sprint_Index\|Innovation Sprint]] | Shaping | Pitch to Byron in Seattle |
| [[C4 Establish Global EA Practice]] | Assessment phase | Perficient proposal due 1/30 |
| M-Files / Associate Hub | At risk | 5/1 unrealistic, reconvene this week |
| Promotions | Details finalized | Comms target 2/1 (Larry/Mark/Brooke) |

---

## Open Threads (Multi-Week)

### Career
- [ ] Cheryl backfill ‚Üí Enterprise Architect ‚Äî pitch to Byron
- [ ] Salesforce credits ($99K) ‚Äî update Byron in 2-3 weeks
- [ ] Naveen re: Puru promotion ‚Äî follow up

### Operational
- [ ] PHENOM functional design ‚Äî end of Feb target
- [ ] Workday Workshop ‚Äî beginning of March, KC office, invite Nandini & Rajesh
- [ ] Email Hiram Morero ‚Äî Producer Org needs
- [ ] HIVE/Nuvento SOW ‚Äî finalize pilot terms

### Personal
- [ ] Seattle flight ‚Äî ice storm affecting, watch for cancellations
- [ ] London trip ‚Äî dates confirmed with Glenn

- **Innovation framing:** Additive, not critical. Don't position thesis as criticism of digital team's POCs ‚Äî it's about scaling the foundation they've built.
- **US market context:** Broker-driven, human-touch sales economy. Lower historical digital investment than UK/Europe. Fundamentals first.
- **M-Files risk:** Brandon said 5/1 is unrealistic. Architecture design and integration build are the blockers.
